input: I was charged twice for my order #8841. I only placed one order and my credit card shows two identical charges of $49.99. Please refund the duplicate.
Can you explain the price increase on my monthly plan? I was paying $12/month and now it says $18. Nobody told me about this.
I need a refund for the annual subscription I purchased yesterday. I didn't realize it was non-refundable but I literally bought it 16 hours ago.
Where is my invoice for January? I need it for tax purposes and it's not showing up in my billing portal like it usually does.
I want to downgrade from the Pro plan to Basic. How do I do that and will I get a prorated refund for the rest of the billing cycle?
Your system charged my expired card somehow and now my bank is hitting me with an overdraft fee. This is unacceptable. I want the charge reversed AND the overdraft fee covered.
Hi, quick question -- do you offer student discounts? I'm a full-time university student and the current pricing is a bit steep for me.
My coupon code SAVE20 isn't working at checkout. It says it's invalid but I just received it in your promotional email this morning.
I cancelled my subscription two months ago but I'm still being charged. This is the third time I've contacted you about this. Fix it now or I'm disputing with my bank.
Can I switch my billing from monthly to annual? I'd like to take advantage of the yearly discount if it's still available.
I was charged sales tax but I'm a tax-exempt organization. Our exemption certificate is on file. Please adjust the invoice.
The payment method update page keeps rejecting my new Visa card. The card works fine everywhere else. Can you update it on your end?
Hey, I need to add a second payment method to my account for the team subscription. Is that possible through the dashboard?
The app crashes every time I try to open the reports dashboard. I'm on iOS 17.2 and it just freezes then closes. Been happening since the last update.
Getting a 500 internal server error when I call the /api/v2/users endpoint. Started about an hour ago. Here's the request ID: req_7fk29xm.
The search function returns zero results no matter what I type. I know for a fact there are matching records because I can see them in the list view.
Everything is incredibly slow today. Pages that normally load in 1-2 seconds are taking 15+ seconds. Is there an outage or something?
I uploaded a CSV file but the import wizard is showing all the data in a single column instead of splitting it into fields. The file is comma-delimited and works in Excel.
The webhook integration with Slack stopped working after your maintenance window last night. No notifications are coming through at all.
Bug report: when I set a due date in the task manager and then edit the task description, the due date resets to today's date. Reproducible every time.
Your mobile app won't sync with the desktop version. I made changes on my phone an hour ago and they're still not showing up on my laptop.
I keep getting a "session expired" error every 5 minutes even though I just logged in. It's making the platform unusable. Chrome 120 on Windows 11.
PDF export is broken. The generated file is blank -- 0 bytes. Tried three different reports, same result every time.
The drag-and-drop feature in the kanban board doesn't work on Firefox. Cards just snap back to their original position. Works fine on Chrome though.
API rate limit seems wrong. Docs say 1000 requests/min but I'm getting throttled at around 200. My API key is on the Business tier.
Notifications are duplicated -- I get the same email notification 3-4 times for every single event. Started happening this week.
I can't log in. I know my password is correct because I just changed it yesterday but it keeps saying invalid credentials.
I need to reset my password but the reset email never arrives. I've checked spam, waited 30 minutes, tried three times. Nothing.
How do I update my company name on my account? We rebranded and I need the new name to show on everything.
Please delete my account and all associated data. I no longer use the service and want my information removed per GDPR.
I'm a team admin but I can't access the user management section. It says I don't have sufficient permissions. My role was definitely set to admin.
I need to transfer ownership of our team account to my colleague. I'm leaving the company next week and she'll be taking over.
Someone seems to have accessed my account. I see login activity from an IP in another country. Please lock my account immediately and help me secure it.
My two-factor authentication isn't working. The codes from my authenticator app are always rejected. I think the time sync might be off.
Can I merge two accounts? I accidentally created a second one with my work email and now my data is split between them.
I want to change the email address on my account from my personal email to my work email. How do I do that without losing any data?
I just joined a new team but the invitation link says it's expired. My manager sent it two days ago. Can you resend it or add me manually?
I need to update my profile photo but the upload button does nothing when I click it. Also want to add my job title to my profile.
Where is my package? Order #33021 was supposed to arrive three days ago and the tracking hasn't updated since it left the warehouse.
I received the wrong item. I ordered a blue large hoodie and got a red medium t-shirt. This is really frustrating.
My package arrived damaged. The box was crushed and the product inside is cracked. I'd like a replacement sent out ASAP.
I need to change the shipping address for order #40892. I just moved and it's going to my old apartment. The order hasn't shipped yet.
Do you offer expedited shipping? I need this by Friday for an event and standard shipping says it won't arrive until next Wednesday.
The tracking number you gave me says it's not found in the carrier's system. It's been two days since you sent the shipping confirmation. Order #55123.
My order was marked as delivered but I never received it. Nobody was home and there's no package at the door or with any neighbors.
Can I pick up my order at your warehouse instead of having it shipped? I live nearby and would rather not wait.
I ordered two items together but only one arrived. The packing slip shows both items but the box only had the keyboard, not the mouse.
What countries do you ship to? I need to send a gift to my friend in New Zealand and I can't find international shipping options at checkout.
My package has been sitting at customs for over a week with no movement. Is there anything you can do to help clear it?
I need to return an item but the return shipping label you emailed me doesn't work. The QR code won't scan at the post office.
Tracking says my order is being returned to sender for some reason. I didn't request a return. What's going on?
